About me

Hi! I'm Sam Edelstein. I am the City of Syracuse's Chief Data Officer and am also a member of city's Innovation Team. When I'm not at work, I'm pursuing a Masters in Information Management with a focus on Data Science from the School of Information Studies at Syracuse University. Previously, I worked for the Office of Alumni Engagement at Syracuse University analyzing data and making recommendations about better ways to do our work.

My Bachelors Degree was in Economics and Policy Studies, also from SU. So I bleed Orange!

I'm married with two kids and a dog, and love to explore, travel, and hike.
